item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, September 24, 2024 at 3:20 AM UTC
item.description:

26. Nintendo Kawaii Progress (Keychain-Sized Nintendo Wii) (8 points | 2 comments)
27. NeRF-Supervised Feature Point Detection and Description (38 points | 1 comment)

29. Cloudflare's new marketplace lets websites charge AI bots for scraping (351 points | 240 comments)
30. Dot (YC S21) Is Hiring an Engineer to Automate Analytics (Remote) ( | hide)
